replies.body: Currently investigating some issues with voting will update the thread as soon as I can

Hey everyone so there were some issues with the voting configuration which allowed people to vote multiple times through incognito. Thats on me. 

To resolve this issue we can either restart the vote with facebook authentication required or use an internal panel.

Let me know what you guys think.
I vote internal panel. I always dislike public voting as it always just comes down to a popularity contest and there's so much potential to abuse the system
Yap i agree Internal panel sounds like the best idea!
Exactly! Comes down to a friends/social media contest instead of basing it off quality and meeting criteria :)

Porque no los dos? :P

(Super excited to be shortlisted here! :D So many awesome cosplays :3)
yours is great ^_^ its actually adorable :D and i love the symbol in the flower!  :) working on a jinx cosplay of my own atm *excited noises* gonna be starguardian jinx this time next month! :D :D

Thanks!!! Yours was cute too, I love that you got Ahri's orb floating so ~mystically~ ;P {{champion:103}} 

but oh my gosh *_[excitement intensifies]_* Please post your SGJ pics when you do it! I'd love to do a Star Guardian cosplay too, and  o m g  if I could find a cos-group......!! {{champion:222}}

^_^ was such a nightmare trying to get it to do that in a photo!! :P i feel on my face a lot and dropped it a lot :P i had a very large amount of outtakes :P many of which i was on the floor because running in heels in a paddock trying to throw a ball in front of a camera is just too much :P 

Ooooh yeeees I really want a star guardian group!!!! I know someone going as star guardian Janna so that's a start!!!! :D :)  that should be your 2017 cosplay goal! :D i'd be keen to see your SGJ too!!! :D :D

since i spent all night harassing my friends and my community pages i wanna say keep the voting up :") But when i saw that my actual favourite of all the cosplays wasn't in the top three for a bit i was a little sad and began questioning the system. In all honesty if it wasn't a popularity contest id be voting for that one instead of having an ego trip and voting for myself. Thats kinda sad cause it  means the best wont win the one who stays up all night harassing everyone they know will win haha! so i'd say internal panel :)
Personally think an internal panel would be the most fair for everyone :)
Sad I didn't get shortlisted, but I can see why :p good work everyone these are awesome!!
Thanks for your entry! which submission was it? I didn't catch your summoner name in the submissions list.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=o2UJcLMg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-09T00:07:16.107+0000)
>
> Thanks for your entry! which submission was it? I didn't catch your summoner name in the submissions list.

I submitted 3 times cause it kept bugging for me D: I was the Rengar! 
https://www.instagram.com/p/BP9W_UNlHNs/?taken-by=slaeoce&hl=en
I see, that one is awesome! I think you did an amazing job =D The only think you were missing was the Homeguards insignia. Great work regardless though, thanks for getting involved.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=o2UJcLMg,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-09T00:33:32.831+0000)
>
> I see, that one is awesome! I think you did an amazing job =D The only think you were missing was the Homeguards insignia. Great work regardless though, thanks for getting involved.

Nah, the version I entered had it :p But thank you so much!
Oh interesting, I just had another look. I couldn't seem to find that one. Could you send that through here? Something must have gone wrong with the Woobox form.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=o2UJcLMg,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-09T00:44:04.260+0000)
>
> Oh interesting, I just had another look. I couldn't seem to find that one. Could you send that through here? Something must have gone wrong with the Woobox form.

http://imgur.com/a/jWUdM 

Also sorry for clogging up comments ;-;
That looks great =D
Is the voting up yet?

Hey ,

There were some issues with the voting configuration so it had to be taken down. 

I will update this thread too but heres the TLDR - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/8pv2O5xO-update-on-art-and-cosplay-contest-voting
What happens if you were shortlisted but got a name change some time after submitting ?

The Braum with the poro's looks awesome!!! 

{{champion:201}}
